member.name: T:Clock.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Clock.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Clock.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Clock.My.Resources.Resources.Clock_9
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: P:Clock.My.Resources.Resources.Clock_Alert
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: T:Clock.SectionDoesNotExistException
member.summary: This exception is thrown whenever the specified section does not exist.

member.name: T:Clock.FieldDoesNotExistException
member.summary: This exception is thrown whenever the specified field inside a section does not exist.

member.name: T:Clock.Item
member.summary: This structure contains the INI data read from the file.

member.name: P:Clock.Item.Field
member.summary: The field name of this item.

member.name: P:Clock.Item.Value
member.summary:
The value of the object.
The type of value will either be: 1) String 2) Boolean 3) Decimal

member.name: T:Clock.Ini
member.summary: An easy to use, managed class to create, read, write, and modify INI files.

member.name: P:Clock.Ini.Items
member.summary: Internal use, used for making sure sections and their respective items are kept organized.

member.name: P:Clock.Ini.Sections
member.summary: Get the different sections in the INI file.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new INI class.

member.name: P:Clock.Ini.Item(System.String)
member.summary: A public accessor to retrieve items based on their section

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new section to the INI file.
member.param: The name of the section to add.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.Add(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a new field to the INI file.
member.param: The section to add the field under.
The value to add. The value must be either a number, a boolean, or a string.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a section from the INI file.
member.param: The name of the section to remove.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.Remove(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes a field from a specified section in the INI file.
member.param: The name of the section to look under.
The name of the field to remove.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.SectionExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if a section exists.
member.param: The name of the section to check.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.FieldExists(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if a field inside of a section exists.
member.param: The name of the section to check under.
The name of the field to look for.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.GetField(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a field in the specified section.
member.param: The specified section to look under.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.GetBooleanField(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a field in the specified section as a boolean
member.param: The specified section to look under.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.GetNumberField(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a field in the specified section as a decimal.
member.param: The specified section to look under.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.GetStringField(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a field in the specified section as a string.
member.param: The specified section to look under.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.SetField(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified field.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.SetBooleanField(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified field to a boolean value.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.SetNumberField(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified field to a numerical value.

member.name: M:Clock.Ini.SetStringField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified field to a string value.
